scripts.pre-build-audit: npm run validate:no-jsx && npm run validate:no-mock && npm run type-check && npm run lint-check
scripts.validate:no-jsx: ! find app lib -name '*.jsx' -not -path '*/node_modules/*' 2>/dev/null | grep . && echo '✓ No JSX files found' || (echo '✗ ERROR: JSX files found! Convert to TSX:' && find app lib -name '*.jsx' -not -path '*/node_modules/*' && exit 1)
scripts.validate:no-mock: ! grep -r 'mockData\|MOCK_DATA\|fakeData\|dummyData\|testData' app/ lib/ --include='*.tsx' --include='*.ts' 2>/dev/null | grep -v '// @production-approved' && echo '✓ No mock data found' || (echo '✗ ERROR: Mock data found!' && grep -r 'mockData\|MOCK_DATA\|fakeData\|dummyData\|testData' app/ lib/ --include='*.tsx' --include='*.ts' | head -10 && exit 1)
scripts.validate:imports: ! grep -r '\.\.\/\.\.\/\.\.\/' app/ lib/ --include='*.tsx' --include='*.ts' 2>/dev/null | grep . && echo '✓ No deep relative imports' || (echo '✗ ERROR: Deep relative imports found!' && grep -r '\.\.\/\.\.\/\.\.\/' app/ lib/ --include='*.tsx' --include='*.ts' | head -10 && exit 1)
scripts.validate:all: npm run validate:no-jsx && npm run validate:no-mock && npm run validate:imports && npm run type-check && npm run lint-check
scripts.audit-code: npm run no-jsx-check && npm run no-mock-data-check && npm run structure-check && npm run validate:structure && npm run validate:data
